title: Weekly Digest (15 December, 2019 - 22 December, 2019)
body:
Here's the Weekly Digest for [status-im/status-react](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):
# ISSUES 
This week, 30 issues were created. Of these, 6 issues have been closed and 24 issues are still open. 
## OPEN ISSUES 
:green_heart: #9721 [Remove balances for deleted watch account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9721), by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:green_heart: #9720 [[Snyk] Fix for 3 vulnerabilities](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9720), by [snyk-bot](https://github.com/snyk-bot)
:green_heart: #9719 [Handle released ENS names](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9719), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9717 [Overall balance is not changing after deleting watch-only account ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9717), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9716 [Copy updates to align Keycard with Status and remove multiaccount](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9716), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9715 [v1 Copy Changes - Onboarding Carousel #9693](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9715), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9714 [v1 Copy Changes - Round 1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9714), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9713 [Add Teller entry points to Status Core app](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9713), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9710 [New empty state in case tx history cannot be shown](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9710), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9709 [Empty gas when transacting leads to bug](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9709), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9708 [Move multiaccount data](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9708), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #9706 [Tozemoon stickers are not shown in chat on recipient side](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9706), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #9705 [java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: 16 > 0 after entering PIN code during pairing if cancel setup after BackUp Seed phrase  (no key on card)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9705), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9704 [Redirect to 1 step from 3 if put card to NFC on Backup seed phrase during pairing (no key on card)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9704), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9703 [Keycard pairing code: evaluate if we simplify format](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9703), by [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis)
:green_heart: #9702 [App stuck in "Pairing card"  when enter wrong pairing code after cancelling account setup (card is initialized)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9702), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:green_heart: #9701 [Place chat's overflow menus in bottom sheet component, tidy up long press menus.](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9701), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #9700 ['Chat' text label is offset to the right](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9700), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #9699 [UI corrections in the stickers panel, scroll / animation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9699), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #9697 [Correct the image asset in the Sticker history panel](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9697), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #9696 [Align the text in the 'Add contact' snackbar to the middle](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9696), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #9695 [Add white background to the bottom of iOS Safe Area](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9695), by [errorists](https://github.com/errorists)
:green_heart: #9694 [[#9203] slow transaction history vol1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9694), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #9693 [v1 Copy Changes - Onboarding Carousel](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9693), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
## CLOSED ISSUES 
:heart: #9718 [Watch-only accounts test and additional waiting when signing transaction](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9718), by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:heart: #9712 [v1 Copy Changes - Key Generation, Storage](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9712), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:heart: #9711 [Topbar. First iteration](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9711), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9707 [v1 Copy Changes - Key Generation, Storage](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9707), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:heart: #9698 [Fix e2e update Dapps to Browser](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9698), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #9692 [remove desktop ui](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9692), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
## LIKED ISSUE 
The issue most liked this week has been:
:+1: #9712 [v1 Copy Changes - Key Generation, Storage](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9712), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
It received :+1: x0, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x2.
## NOISY ISSUE 
The issue most discussed this week has been:
:speaker: #9708 [Move multiaccount data](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9708), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
It received 12 comments.

# PULL REQUESTS
This week, 22 pull requests were proposed. Of these, 0 pull requests have been merged and 7 are still open.
## OPEN PRs 
:green_heart: #9721 [Remove balances for deleted watch account](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9721), by [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3)
:green_heart: #9720 [[Snyk] Fix for 3 vulnerabilities](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9720), by [snyk-bot](https://github.com/snyk-bot)
:green_heart: #9716 [Copy updates to align Keycard with Status and remove multiaccount](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9716), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9715 [v1 Copy Changes - Onboarding Carousel #9693](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9715), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9714 [v1 Copy Changes - Round 1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9714), by [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman)
:green_heart: #9708 [Move multiaccount data](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9708), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #9694 [[#9203] slow transaction history vol1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9694), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)

# CONTRIBUTORS 
This week, 11 users have contributed to this repository. 
They are [acolytec3](https://github.com/acolytec3), [snyk-bot](https://github.com/snyk-bot), [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin), [churik](https://github.com/churik), [hesterbruikman](https://github.com/hesterbruikman), [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer), [yenda](https://github.com/yenda), [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy), [guylouis](https://github.com/guylouis), [errorists](https://github.com/errorists), and [rasom](https://github.com/rasom).

# STARGAZERS
This week, no user has starred this repository.

# COMMITS
This week, there have been 21 commits in the repository.
These are: 
:hammer_and_wrench: [v1 Copy Changes - Key Generation, Storage

Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/0fa6ae589be85af8a69d6989e2beea3f32adba7f) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Watch-only test and additional waiting when signing transaction

Signed-off-by: Churikova Tetiana <churikova.tm@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1d0ab4052d3c4b78ed7af3c2bd87ed3c161d26df) by [churik](https://github.com/churik)
:hammer_and_wrench: [topbar. first iteration

Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a72d4c7d856e807e219822692780fb9733e7b3fa) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [removed show_ens_in_chats toggle from e2e

Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/1a61ae4b734d333cf47c1a34555e147e318c8c07) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [update Arabic, French, Italian, Korean and Chinese translations

Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a21454039bb9d49fda15eee6e56fefa09c015bc5) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Searchbar show\hide fixed

Signed-off-by: Volodymyr Kozieiev <vkjr.sp@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/5c7dc2edc7ae25372b162474497875c7b426c513) by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:hammer_and_wrench: [modified switch_network

Accounts were previously stored within the multiaccount `setting`
serialized in transit

This moves [:multiaccount :accounts] to `:multiaccount/accounts` and uses
the `getAccounts`, `saveAccounts` and `deleteAccounts` endpoints.

Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/2c3e831a03c0f32f4421420cedf5909cbc30cbc8) by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)

 # RELEASES
This week, no releases were published.

That's all for this week, please watch :eyes: and star :star: [status-im/status-react](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:
